title: Part 4: What is a meaningful life — Science
description:
Science is the religion of the modern world, or the pretend religion. We are told that people can believe in "science," but can they? Does science give a person meaning and can you live by science without God? Does Science even exist without God? All this and more discussed in this video. 

This is episode 5 of my podcast. 

Make sure to like and subscribe

Check out my podcast: https://anchor.fm/coltonkirby

--Links--
My Website: https://www.coltonkirby.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/_coltonkirby
Parler: https://parler.com/profile/coltonkirby/posts
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/coltonjkirby/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/_coltonkirby/
Pintrest: https://www.pinterest.com/coltonjkirby/
Quora: https://www.quora.com/profile/Colton-Kirby-7
